Body:
"""
        Test that a TypeError is raised when an invalid object group value
        is used to construct an ObjectGroup attribute.
        """
kwargs = {'object_group': []}
self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError, 'The object group must be a string.',
    objects.ObjectGroup, **kwargs)
args = objects.ObjectGroup(), 'object_group', []
self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError, 'The object group must be a string.',
    setattr, *args)
